title: Virtual-Kun Wa Otonari-San Kara Nigetai
alternative_title: Virtual streamer wants to get away from the next-door neighbor ; バーチャルくんはおとなりさんから逃げたい
status: Virtual streamer wants to get away from the next-door neighbor ; バーチャルくんはおとなりさんから逃げたい
description:
Description :
        Haru, a university student who stream under a virtual character, has moved into a completely soundproofed flat, which he has longed for.On the day he moves in, he meets his neighbour Tsukasa, a fashionable young man close to his age, which is a relief.However, on the night of the move, he is caught on the balcony during a live broadcast!To avoid being exposed, Haru asks him not to tell anyone about the streaming, but Tsukasa suggests with a sneer, saying "Instead of keeping it a secret, will you go out with me?"
